languages.text: {n}Странный технический запах, тонкая пленка на поверхности... что бы вам ни налили, вряд ли первоначальным предназначением этой жидкости было употребление внутрь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Странный технический запах, тонкая пленка на поверхности... что бы вам ни налили, вряд ли первоначальным предназначением этой жидкости было употребление внутрь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Странный технический запах, тонкая пленка на поверхности... что бы вам ни налили, вряд ли первоначальным предназначением этой жидкости было употребление внутрь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The strange technical smell, the thin film on the surface... whatever it is that's been poured to you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was internal consumption.{/n}
{n}The strange technical smell, the thin film on the surface... whatever it is that's been poured to you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was internal consumption.{/n}
{n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}
{n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}
{n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这杯酒带着古怪的工业味道，表面上还挂着一层薄膜……虽然不知道它究竟是什么，但制造它最初的目的，似乎不太可能是为了喝掉它。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这杯酒带着古怪的工业味道，表面上还挂着一层薄膜……虽然不知道它究竟是什么，但制造它最初的目的，似乎不太可能是为了喝掉它。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El peculiar olor industrial, la fina capa de la superficie... Sea lo que sea eso, no parece que ingerirlo sea lo más sensato.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El peculiar olor industrial, la fina capa de la superficie... Sea lo que sea eso, no parece que ingerirlo sea lo más sensato.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異様な工業臭、表面の薄い膜…何を注がれたのかわからないが、飲料用に作られたものとは考えにくい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異様な工業臭、表面の薄い膜…何を注がれたのかわからないが、飲料用に作られたものとは考えにくい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dieser seltsame industrielle Geruch, der dünne Film auf der Oberfläche ... Was immer dir da eingeschenkt wurde, es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass der ursprüngliche Verwendungszweck irgendetwas mit Nahrungsaufnahme zu tun hatte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieser seltsame industrielle Geruch, der dünne Film auf der Oberfläche ... Was immer dir da eingeschenkt wurde, es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass der ursprüngliche Verwendungszweck irgendetwas mit Nahrungsaufnahme zu tun hatte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'étrange odeur industrielle, la fine pellicule à la surface... Vous ne savez pas ce qu'elle vient de vous servir, mais ce liquide n'a clairement jamais été conçu pour être ingéré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'étrange odeur industrielle, la fine pellicule à la surface... Vous ne savez pas ce qu'elle vient de vous servir, mais ce liquide n'a clairement jamais été conçu pour être ingéré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tuhaf endüstriyel kokusundan tut da yüzeyindeki ince zara kadar... Karşındaki kadehe dökülen her neyse aslen insan tüketimi için olmadığı muhtemel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange industrial smell, the thin film on the surface... Whatever it is that's been poured out for you, it seems unlikely that its original purpose was ingestion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuhaf endüstriyel kokusundan tut, yüzeyindeki ince zara kadar... Karşında kadehe dökülen her neyse, aslen insan tüketimi için olmadığı muhtemel.{/n}
